content: Parenting Lifestyle AMA SG Budget Babe Asked by AnonymousAsked on 14 Aug 2018Congratulations on your baby! Abit early to think about it.. but what financial wisdom would you seek to impart to your child? "Always remember this..... XXX XXX"?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Dawn FionaLevel 5. GeniusUpdated on 07 Jun 2019To never look at price but to consider value. 
To make him think and spend in terms of utility. 
That money is a means to an end but it isn't everything either. 1 comment1
Chan Hian Yi15 Aug 2018Thanks for sharing.. so simple yet so wise!
